attributes.action: To bring back the Death Penalty for pedophiles, rapists, & vicious murderers.
attributes.additional_details: Parents who viciously beat their children to death should get the death penalty.Rapists deserve the death penalty, they are ruining so many victims lives. Not just the victims, their families and loved ones.Pedophiles should be given the lethal injection, we need to protect our children from those who mean to do them harm.We need to protect our citizens and show them that the justice system is not broken. By bringing the death penalty back we will make people think twice before breaking the law.
attributes.background: The government and parliament needs to bring back the death penalty for rapists, pedophiles and vicious murderers. It has been far too long that the United Kingdom has stood back and watched their children, be tortured and become victims of sexual abuse, with little to no punishment.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same/a similar action: 

Bring back the death penalty for certain offences including murder: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585532

Bring back the death penalty for sexual abuse against children:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593534
